content.rendered:
Some recent faves from my daily portrait project. It’s proving to be an interesting challenge, making me look for, see and take opportunities to interact with people and make portraits of the people I meet where otherwise I might be too shy to ask. I’ve met some great characters and made some new friends.

Nearly a month down, only eleven more to go.
